settings.provider_selected: Provider selected. Please validate your API key.
settings.delete_account_desc: Delete your account along with all sessions, attachments, and vector memory.
settings.delete_account_confirm: Delete your account and all data? This action is irreversible.
settings.profile_summary_hint: EGO automatically creates a brief summary about you based on your conversations. You can view and edit it here.
settings.profile_summary_placeholder: Here will be brief information about you that EGO forms automatically based on your conversations...
settings.profile_summary_clear_confirm: Clear profile information? It will be restored automatically based on future conversations.

knowego.title: EGO — AI Assistant
knowego.subtitle: Intelligent Agents. Adaptive Modes. Long-term Memory.
knowego.hero_subtitle: A practical AI agent for analysis and complex tasks. EGO uses Reasoning and Native tool calling to solve problems, not just answer questions. Currently in Beta*.
knowego.hero_highlight: Agent with long-term memory and tools
knowego.hero_description: An AI that shows its thinking process.
knowego.metrics_2: Adaptive user profile based on conversations.
knowego.metrics_3: Choose any models and providers. Your keys.
knowego.how_step1_desc: EGO understands complex tasks, creates plans and selects needed tools.
knowego.how_step2_desc: See every step: web search, code execution, calculations, and memory recall.
knowego.how_step3_desc: Get solution and EGO remembers everything for future tasks without token costs.
knowego.modes_subtitle: Optimized for different levels of complexity.
knowego.providers_subtitle: Start with our free default provider, powered by Gemini 2.5 Flash. For more power, connect your own API key for providers like OpenAI, Claude, and xAI.
knowego.pricing_advantage_subtitle: EGO delivers exceptional value with lower costs and higher token limits
knowego.pricing_advantage_desc: Our default Gemini Flash model provides more tokens per dollar compared to expensive models, delivering better results at a fraction of the cost.
knowego.features_subtitle: An agent with memory, tools, and transparent thinking
knowego.tool_ego_search_desc: Fresh information search from Google API.
knowego.tool_ego_user_summary_desc: EGO builds a dynamic summary of your preferences and context to personalize every interaction.
knowego.tool_ego_code_exec_desc: Python code execution in a safe environment for calculations and analysis.
knowego.tool_ego_memory_desc: Search information from past conversations using vector embeddings.
knowego.tool_ego_calc_desc: Advanced mathematical computations with SymPy for complex equations and symbolic algebra.
knowego.tool_ego_knowledge_desc: Access to encyclopedic knowledge for factual information and verified references.
knowego.advanced_reasoning_subtitle: Elevate your AI with multi-agent intelligence and adversarial thinking
knowego.tool_super_ego_desc: A group of independent AI experts thoroughly analyzes your task to reach the most balanced and reliable solution through consensus.
knowego.tool_alter_ego_desc: Your personal critic that finds hidden flaws in reasoning, challenges logic, and helps refine ideas to perfection.
knowego.tool_alterego_desc: Re-analysis of problems from different viewpoints and personas.
knowego.tool_visible_thinking_desc: Observe EGO's full thinking process step-by-step with integrated self-critique.
knowego.tool_multimodal_desc: Process text, images, and files seamlessly for analysis.
knowego.feature_thinking_desc: Watch EGO's reasoning unfold in real-time. See tool selection, decision-making, and problem-solving strategies with complete transparency.
knowego.feature_memory_desc: EGO remembers your projects, preferences, and context across all sessions. No repetitive explanations, just continuous collaboration.
knowego.feature_models_desc: Switch between different LLM providers and models to find the perfect balance of cost, speed, and intelligence for your specific task.
knowego.feature_instructions_desc: Configure agent behavior for each project. Create unique personality and work style.
knowego.feature_persona_desc: Set a role or personality in the system instructions, and EGO will strictly adhere to it in every response, ensuring consistent interaction.
knowego.feature_tools_desc: Search the web, execute code, perform calculations and recall memories via Native tool calling.
knowego.feature_return_desc: Delegate complex tasks and focus on your work. EGO completes the job and notifies you of results.
knowego.feature_edit_desc: Change your request with one click and get a new response instantly, preserving all context.
knowego.agentic_step1_desc: EGO evaluates if it has enough info. If not, it actively searches memory and files.
knowego.agentic_step2_desc: Executes atomic tool calls (Code, Search) to advance the solution.
knowego.agentic_step3_desc: Self-critique: 'Did that work?' If the output is poor, it retries automatically.
knowego.agentic_step4_desc: Loops until confidence is high (>90%) before giving you the answer.
knowego.mode_adaptive_desc: Universal mode for any task. AI chooses the best approach to solve.
knowego.mode_deeper_desc: For complex tasks requiring detailed planning and multi-step solutions.
knowego.mode_research_desc: Automatic collection and analysis of information from multiple sources. Ready conclusions instead of links.
knowego.mode_agent_desc: Complete autonomy. Give a goal — get a ready solution with code, documentation, and action plan.
knowego.cta_block_sub: Start your first session and see EGO in action.
knowego.stats_subtitle: Real-time metrics from our growing community
knowego.footnote: *EGO is currently in Beta. We are actively working on improving its capabilities.
knowego.footnote2: **The default EGO provider is free to use with Gemini 2.5 Flash - offering more tokens at lower cost than premium models. Connecting a third-party LLM provider requires your own API key and is subject to that provider's billing.
knowego.footnote3: EGO's memory is injected into the prompt to maintain context, which consumes tokens on third-party LLM providers.
knowego.demo_different_subtitle: Unlike other AI assistants, EGO shows you exactly how it thinks.
knowego.demo_step_upload: User uploads Python file with performance issue
knowego.demo_step_analyze: EGO analyzes code and identifies bottleneck
knowego.demo_step_creative_review: AlterEgo reviews UX from multiple perspectives
knowego.footer_disclaimer: EGO is a personal AI assistant with transparent reasoning capabilities. Designed to automate complex analytical workflows.
knowego.footer_experiment_description: AI agent with tools and long-term memory.
knowego.faq_subtitle: Everything you need to know about EGO.

faqs.a: EGO is a reasoning-first AI agent designed for complex tasks. Unlike standard chat AIs, it uses tools (search, code, memory) and shows you its step-by-step thinking process.
Bring Your Own Key (BYOK) allows you to connect your own API keys from providers like OpenAI, Anthropic, or Google. You only pay for what you use directly to the provider.
Yes. If you use your own keys, your data is processed according to your provider's terms. EGO doesn't train on your data unless you explicitly use our default models.
It's a long-term memory system that allows EGO to remember context from past conversations semantically, making it smarter over time.

legal.terms_intro:
This Terms of Service agreement (hereinafter referred to as the "Agreement") constitutes a legally binding contract between the Owner of the EGO service (hereinafter referred to as the "Administrator", "We", or "Us") and any individual or legal entity accessing or using the Service (hereinafter referred to as the "User" or "You").

By accessing the Service, creating an Account, sending requests to the API, or purchasing a subscription, you explicitly acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by the terms and conditions of this Agreement.

WARNING: IF YOU DO NOT AGREE TO BE BOUND BY THIS AGREEMENT, YOU MUST IMMEDIATELY CEASE ALL USE OF THE SERVICE.
legal.terms_1_content:
For the purposes of this Agreement, the following terms shall have the meanings ascribed to them below:

  • 1.1. "Service" means the software and hardware complex known as "EGO," accessible via the URL https://askego.xyz and its subdomains, which provides functionality for interacting with artificial intelligence models.
  • 1.2. "Account" means a unique record in the Service’s database containing User information, required for identification and access to the Service's functionality.
  • 1.3. "User Content" means any data, text, files, images, software code, and other materials uploaded, transmitted, or created by the User while using the Service (including input parameters for requests, known as "Prompts").
  • 1.4. "Output" (or "Generation Results") means text, graphics, or other data generated by the Service in response to a User’s Prompt using artificial intelligence technologies.
legal.terms_2_content:
2.1. The Administrator hereby grants the User a personal, non-exclusive, non-transferable, revocable, limited license to access and use the Service strictly in accordance with this Agreement.

2.2. "AS IS" Basis. The Service is provided on an "AS IS" and "AS AVAILABLE" basis. The Administrator makes no representations or warranties that the Service will meet the User’s requirements, or that the operation of the Service will be uninterrupted, timely, secure, or error-free.

2.3. The Service may be used worldwide, provided that such use does not violate the local laws of the User’s jurisdiction.
legal.terms_3_content:
3.1. To access the full functionality of the Service, the User must register an Account by providing accurate, current, and complete information.

3.2. The User is solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account credentials (login, password, OAuth tokens) and for all activities that occur under their Account.

3.3. Any actions performed using the User’s Account are deemed to have been performed by the User. The Administrator shall not be liable for any loss or damage arising from the User’s failure to comply with this security obligation.

3.4. By using the Service, the User represents and warrants that they are at least 16 years of age (or the age of majority in their jurisdiction) and have the full right, power, and authority to enter into this Agreement.
legal.terms_4_content:
4.1. Rights to User Content

4.1.1. The User retains all ownership and intellectual property rights to the User Content.

4.1.2. By submitting User Content to the Service, the User grants the Administrator a worldwide, royalty-free, non-exclusive license to use, host, store, reproduce, modify, and display such Content solely for the purpose of operating, providing, improving, and debugging the Service (e.g., sending the Prompt to the AI provider’s API and displaying the Output).

4.1.3. The User represents and warrants that they own or have the necessary licenses, rights, consents, and permissions to use and authorize the Administrator to use all User Content in the manner contemplated by the Service and this Agreement.

4.2. Acceptable Use Policy (AUP)

The User agrees NOT to use the Service to:

  • Violate any applicable local, state, national, or international law or regulation.
  • Upload, post, or otherwise transmit any content that is unlawful, harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, defamatory, vulgar, obscene, libelous, invasive of another's privacy, or hateful.
  • Interfere with or disrupt the integrity or performance of the Service, including conducting DDoS attacks or introducing malicious code (viruses, worms, trojans).
  • Engage in unauthorized automated data collection (scraping, crawling) without the Administrator's prior written consent.
  • Reverse engineer, decompile, or disassemble the Service or attempt to derive the source code of the Service.
legal.terms_5_content:
5.1. The User acknowledges and agrees that the Service utilizes artificial intelligence and machine learning technologies (LLM).

5.2. Accuracy Disclaimer. Output generated by the Service is probabilistic in nature. The Administrator does not guarantee the accuracy, reliability, currency, or completeness of any Output. The User acknowledges that the Output may contain factual errors ("hallucinations"), biases, or offensive material.

5.3. No Professional Advice. The Service is not intended to provide, and must not be relied upon for, medical, legal, financial, or other professional advice. Any reliance on the Output is at the User’s sole risk. The User should consult with a qualified professional before making any decisions based on the Output.
legal.terms_6_content:
6.1. The Service may be offered on a free or paid basis (Subscription).

6.2. If the User purchases a Subscription, they authorize the Administrator (or its third-party payment processor) to charge the applicable fees on a recurring basis (e.g., monthly) until the Subscription is cancelled.

6.3. The Administrator reserves the right to change pricing at any time. Any price changes will take effect at the start of the next billing cycle following notice to the User.

6.4. Non-Refundable. All payments are final and non-refundable, except as expressly required by applicable law.
legal.terms_7_content:
7.1. The Service, including its "look and feel" (e.g., text, graphics, images, logos), proprietary content, information and other materials, are protected under copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. The Administrator owns all right, title, and interest in and to the Service (excluding User Content).

7.2. Nothing in this Agreement grants the User any right to use the Administrator’s trademarks, logos, domain names, or other distinctive brand features.
legal.terms_8_content:
PLEASE READ THIS SECTION CAREFULLY.

8.1. TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW, IN NO EVENT SHALL THE ADMINISTRATOR, ITS AFFILIATES, AGENTS, DIRECTORS, OR EMPLOYEES BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, PUNITIVE, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR EXEMPLARY DAMAGES, INCLUDING WITHOUT LIMITATION DAMAGES FOR LOSS OF PROFITS, GOODWILL, USE, DATA, OR OTHER INTANGIBLE LOSSES, ARISING OUT OF OR RELATING TO THE USE OF, OR INABILITY TO USE, THE SERVICE.

8.2. UNDER NO CIRCUMSTANCES WILL THE ADMINISTRATOR BE RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY DAMAGE, LOSS, OR INJURY RESULTING FROM HACKING, TAMPERING, OR OTHER UNAUTHORIZED ACCESS OR USE OF THE SERVICE OR THE USER'S ACCOUNT.

8.3. THE ADMINISTRATOR’S TOTAL CUMULATIVE LIABILITY FOR ALL CLAIMS ARISING OUT OF OR RELATING TO THIS AGREEMENT OR THE SERVICE SHALL NOT EXCEED THE GREATER OF: (A) THE TOTAL AMOUNT PAID BY THE USER TO THE ADMINISTRATOR FOR USE OF THE SERVICE DURING THE THREE (3) MONTHS PRIOR TO THE CLAIM; OR (B) FIFTY US DOLLARS ($50.00).
legal.terms_9_content: 9.1. The User agrees to defend, indemnify, and hold harmless the Administrator and its licensees and licensors, and their employees, contractors, agents, officers, and directors, from and against any and all claims, damages, obligations, losses, liabilities, costs or debt, and expenses (including but not limited to attorney's fees), resulting from: (a) the User’s use and access to the Service; (b) the User’s violation of any term of this Agreement; or (c) the User’s violation of any third-party right, including without limitation any copyright, property, or privacy right.
legal.terms_10_content:
10.1. The Administrator reserves the right to modify or replace this Agreement at any time. If a revision is material, we will try to provide at least 30 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect. What constitutes a material change will be determined at our sole discretion.

10.2. The Administrator may terminate or suspend the User’s access to the Service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if the User breaches the Agreement.

10.3. The User may terminate this Agreement at any time by deleting their Account via the Service settings.
legal.terms_11_content:
11.1. Governing Law. This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Administrator's jurisdiction, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

11.2. Severability. If any provision of this Agreement is held to be invalid or unenforceable by a court, the remaining provisions of this Agreement will remain in effect.

11.3. Entire Agreement. This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement between the User and the Administrator regarding the Service and supersedes any prior agreements.
legal.terms_12_content: If you have any questions about this Agreement, please contact us at: support@askego.xyz.
legal.privacy_intro:
This Privacy Policy (hereinafter referred to as the "Policy") outlines the practices regarding the collection, use, storage, and protection of information about Users (hereinafter referred to as "You" or the "User") by the Administrator of the EGO service (hereinafter referred to as "We", the "Service", or the "Administrator").

By accessing the website https://askego.xyz, registering for the Service, or submitting your personal data, you explicitly agree to the terms and conditions of this Policy.
legal.privacy_1_content:
1.1. This Policy is designed in accordance with generally accepted international data protection standards.

1.2. We respect your privacy and adhere to the principle of data minimization: we collect only the information that is strictly necessary for the functioning of the Service and the provision of the declared functionality.
legal.privacy_2_content:
We collect and process the following categories of data:

2.1. Account and Authentication Data

  • Email address.
  • Password hashes (if registering via email/password). We do not store passwords in plain text.
  • Authorization tokens and unique identifiers provided by third-party identity providers (e.g., Google OAuth) when using social login.

2.2. User Content

  • Text Data: Input queries ("Prompts") and the history of dialogues with the AI agent.
  • Files: Documents, images, and other materials uploaded by the User for analysis.
  • Session Metadata: Information regarding the structure of dialogues, timestamps of creation, and modification of records.

2.3. Derived Data and Vector Memory (Embeddings)

To enable "Long-term Memory" and context-aware search features, the Service performs technical processing of your content:

  • Creation of Vector Embeddings — numerical vector representations reflecting the semantic meaning of the text.
  • Creation of text summaries from dialogue history.

Note: This feature can be managed or disabled by the User via the Service settings.

2.4. Third-Party API Keys

If the Service functionality involves the use of the User’s own API keys (e.g., OpenAI API Key, Anthropic API Key), we store these keys exclusively in an encrypted format (using AES-256 or a comparable standard).

2.5. Technical Information (Telemetry)

  • IP address and device type.
  • Browser data (User-Agent).
  • System logs: server response times, error codes, model usage statistics. This information is collected in an anonymized form for system stability and debugging.
legal.privacy_3_content:
We use the collected data for the following purposes:

3.1. Service Provision: Processing your requests, generating AI responses, and maintaining conversation context.

3.2. Personalization: Utilizing vector memory to adapt the Agent's responses to the User's style and preferences.

3.3. Interaction with External Providers: Transmitting prompt text (stripped of personal identifiers where feasible) to Large Language Model (LLM) providers to obtain generations.

3.4. Security: Detecting and preventing fraud, DDoS attacks, and abuse of the Service functionality.
legal.privacy_4_content:
4.1. We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal data to third parties for marketing purposes.

4.2. Data Transfer for AI Processing: The User acknowledges and agrees that to generate responses, text prompts are transmitted via secure channels (API) to artificial intelligence providers (e.g., OpenAI, Anthropic, Google). Data processing on the side of these providers is governed by their respective privacy policies.

4.3. We reserve the right to disclose User information to government authorities only if expressly required by applicable law and only in response to a formal, legally valid request.
legal.privacy_5_content:
5.1. Retention Period: We retain Account Data and User Content in active databases for as long as the User's Account exists, or until the User initiates its deletion.

5.2. Backups: To ensure system resilience and data integrity, data may be stored in encrypted backup copies. The retention period for information in backups is up to 90 (ninety) days. Upon deletion of data from the active system, it will be permanently removed from backups after the overwrite cycle expires.

5.3. Vector Memory: If the memory function is disabled or the history is cleared in the settings, the corresponding vector embeddings are deleted from the vector database without the possibility of recovery.
legal.privacy_6_content:
6.1. The Service uses cookies and browser LocalStorage strictly for technical purposes:

  • Storing the session token (authentication).
  • Storing user interface preferences (theme, language, display parameters).

6.2. We do not use third-party advertising cookies or trackers that monitor User behavior across other websites.
legal.privacy_7_content:
7.1. We implement a comprehensive set of technical and organizational measures to protect data:

  • Use of TLS (Transport Layer Security) to encrypt all traffic between the client and the server.
  • Encryption at Rest: Storage of sensitive data (e.g., API keys) in encrypted form using cryptographically strong algorithms.
  • Software-level isolation of data belonging to different users.

7.2. Despite these measures, the User acknowledges that no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure.
legal.privacy_8_content:
You have the following rights regarding your data:

8.1. Right to Access: You may request information about what data we store about you.

8.2. Right to Rectification: You may independently update your account information via the profile settings.

8.3. Right to Erasure ("Right to be Forgotten"): You have the right to delete your Account and all associated data at any time via the Service interface or by sending a request to support.

8.4. Right to Data Portability: You may copy your dialogues and content before deleting your Account.
legal.privacy_9_content:
9.1. The Administrator reserves the right to update or modify this Policy at any time.

9.2. We will notify you of any material changes by posting a notice on the Site or sending an email.

9.3. Continued use of the Service after the effective date of the changes constitutes acceptance of the revised Policy.
legal.privacy_10_content: If you have any questions regarding this Policy or the processing of your data, please contact us at: support@askego.xyz.
